nodes.text: "Art For Art's Sake" is a mini adventure for use in the Rise of the Empire era, published on the Wizards of the Coast website. It was written by Jeff Quick and published on February 20, 2003.

Set on Coruscant during the Rise of the Empire era, it puts your heroes in hot pursuit of artifact thieves in an exciting speeder chase through the crowded skies. Not only must the heroes contend with the criminals themselves, but they also must handle the planet's security forces - and a new aquatic predator who plays an unexpected role in the adventure!
"Art For Art's Sake" is intended for four player characters of 7th level.
